sect2.title: Modutils Installation Dependencies
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib, strip Bison: bison Coreutils: basename, cat, chmod, expr, hostname, install, ln, mkdir, mv, rm, tr, uname Diffutils: cmp Flex: flex Gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc Grep: egrep, grep Make: make Sed: sed
